title: mOhanamAi tigazhumE
sahitya:
mOhanamAi tigazhumE rAmA unnuru


anupallavi

  mOhana muruval konjum vadanattaruL pozhiyum iru vizhiyum anbar uLLam
 mayanga aruL pozhiyum iru vizhiyum anbar uLLam mayanga


caraNam    mukti aLikkum un tAraka nAmamum vaitta kuri tavarAc-caram taritta karamum vandaDaindOrkku
 abhayam tandiDum kazhalum metta ninaindu nittam paNindu cittam kaLittiDum uttamar tammiDai
